title: Monopyle ecuadorensis
text: Monopyle ecuadorensis is a species of <a href="plant">plant</a> in the family <a href="Gesneriaceae">Gesneriaceae</a>. It is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Ecuador">Ecuador</a>. Its natural <a href="habitat">habitat</a>s are subtropical or tropical moist lowland <a href="forest">forest</a>s and subtropical or tropical moist <a href="montane%20forest">montane forest</a>s.
